preset.title: Preset
preset.tooltip: Chooses the settings for you. You can still change the settings after selecting a preset.

randomIterations.title: Randomizer Iterations
randomIterations.tooltip: Use with the Random preset. Controls how many settings to randomize at once. The minimum only changes a few, the maximum changes nearly all of them.

randomDifficulty.title: Randomizer Difficulty
randomDifficulty.tooltip: Use with the Random preset. Controls how likely it is for dangerous settings to be randomized, like disabling your suit. The minimum makes it impossible, the maximum makes it very possible.

disableGravityCrystal.title: Disable Ship Gravity
disableGravityCrystal.tooltip: Disables the gravity crystal inside the ship.

disableHeadlights.title: Disable Headlights
disableHeadlights.tooltip: Disables the ship headlights and the landing camera light.

disableLandingCamera.title: Disable Landing Camera
disableLandingCamera.tooltip: Disables the landing camera. Good luck making a proper landing!

disableEjectButton.title: Disable Eject Button
disableEjectButton.tooltip: Disables the eject button in the cockpit.

disableShipLights.title: Disable Ship Lights
disableShipLights.tooltip: Permanently turns off both the interior and exterior lighting fixtures.

disableAutoLights.title: Disable Automatic Lights
disableAutoLights.tooltip: Keeps all of the lights on when you leave the ship instead of turning them off.

disableShipOxygen.title: Disable Ship Oxygen
disableShipOxygen.tooltip: Removes all of the oxygen from your ship. Don't stay out in space for too long!

disableScoutRecall.title: Disable Ship Scout Recall
disableScoutRecall.tooltip: Removes your ability to recall the scout with the ship.

disableScoutLaunching.title: Disable Ship Scout Launching
disableScoutLaunching.tooltip: Removes your ability to launch the scout with the ship.

enableManualScoutRecall.title: Disable Handheld Scout Recall
enableManualScoutRecall.tooltip: Forces you to retrieve your scout by hand when you launch it. If you retrieve it with the ship, you need to go get it from on top of the ship before you can fire it again on foot.

disableThrusters.title: Disable Thrusters
disableThrusters.tooltip: Lets you disable some of your ship's thrusters.

disableDamageIndicators.title: Disable Damage Indicators
disableDamageIndicators.tooltip: Removes all indicators that tell you the ship is damaged. Also disables the master alarm. Keep an eye or four on the reactor!

disableSeatbelt.title: Disable Seatbelt
disableSeatbelt.tooltip: Removes the seatbelt in your ship that keeps you from killing yourself. If you crash into something too quickly you'll fly out of your chair.

disableShipSuit.title: Disable Ship Suit
disableShipSuit.tooltip: Removes the suit from the ship. How long can you hold your breath in space?

disableShipMedkit.title: Disable Ship Medkit
disableShipMedkit.tooltip: Prevents you from recovering health using the ship supplies.

disableHatch.title: Disable Ship Hatch
disableHatch.tooltip: Completely removes the hatch from your ship. Be careful walking around in there!

singleUseTractorBeam.title: Single-Use Tractor Beam
singleUseTractorBeam.tooltip: Disables the tractor beam after you enter the ship.

disableAirAutoRoll.title: Disable Air Auto Roll
disableAirAutoRoll.tooltip: Allows your ship to rotate freely in atmospheres.

disableWaterAutoRoll.title: Disable Water Auto Roll
disableWaterAutoRoll.tooltip: Allows your ship to rotate freely in water.

disableFluidPrevention.title: Disable Fluid Prevention
disableFluidPrevention.tooltip: Allows fluids like sand and water to enter your ship.

disableHazardPrevention.title: Disable Hazard Prevention
disableHazardPrevention.tooltip: Allows hazards like heat and ghost matter to damage you while inside of the ship.

disableReferenceFrame.title: Disable Lock-on
disableReferenceFrame.tooltip: Disables your ability to lock on to objects. You may find it difficult to use autopilot with this enabled.

disableMapMarkers.title: Disable HUD Markers
disableMapMarkers.tooltip: Removes the on-screen markers that show you the location of your ship, your scout, and any marked locations in the ship log.

disableMinimapMarkers.title: Disable Minimap Markers
disableMinimapMarkers.tooltip: Turns off the icons showing the location of your ship and scout on your suit's minimap and your ship's minimap.

oxygenDrainMultiplier.title: Oxygen Drain Multiplier
oxygenDrainMultiplier.tooltip: Larger numbers increase the speed at which the ship oxygen drains. The default speed takes about 12.8 hours to fully drain.

fuelDrainMultiplier.title: Fuel Drain Multiplier
fuelDrainMultiplier.tooltip: Larger numbers increase the speed at which the ship fuel drains. The default speed takes about 34 minutes to fully drain.

oxygenTankDrainMultiplier.title: Oxygen Tank Drain Multiplier
oxygenTankDrainMultiplier.tooltip: Larger numbers increase the amount of oxygen that drains when the oxygen tank is damaged in addition to the regular drain rate. The default speed is 38 times faster.

fuelTankDrainMultiplier.title: Fuel Tank Drain Multiplier
fuelTankDrainMultiplier.tooltip: Larger numbers increase the amount of fuel that drains when the fuel tank is damaged in addition to the regular drain rate. The default speed is about 10 times faster.

idleFuelConsumptionMultiplier.title: Idle Fuel Consumption Multiplier
idleFuelConsumptionMultiplier.tooltip: Larger numbers increase the rate at which your ship's fuel drains while it is on. The default speed is about 100 times slower than the active consumption rate.

shipDamageMultiplier.title: Damage Multiplier
shipDamageMultiplier.tooltip: Larger numbers increase the damage done to the ship hull and increase the probability that components will be damaged on impact.

shipDamageSpeedMultiplier.title: Damage Speed Multiplier
shipDamageSpeedMultiplier.tooltip: Larger numbers increase the minimum speed for taking impact damage. Set this to something super small to blow up your ship when you touch something.

randomHullDamage.title: Random Hull Damage
randomHullDamage.tooltip: Deals a random amount of damage to a number of hulls at the start of the loop. A minimum value means no hulls are damaged and a maximum value means every hull is damaged.

randomComponentDamage.title: Random Component Damage
randomComponentDamage.tooltip: Breaks a number of the ship's components excluding the important ones. A minimum value means no components are damaged and a maximum value means every component is damaged.

enableStunDamage.title: Enable Stun Damage
enableStunDamage.tooltip: Temporarily stuns you if you hit something too hard with the ship.

enableFragileShip.title: Enable Fragile Ship
enableFragileShip.tooltip: You are unable to pilot your ship if anything is damaged.

preventSystemFailure.title: Prevent System Failure
preventSystemFailure.tooltip: Forces the ship to stay functional unless the cockpit detaches.

repairLimit.title: Repair Limit
repairLimit.tooltip: Turns off ship repairing after you repair this many parts. Set to -1 to disable.

repairTimeMultiplier.title: Repair Time Multiplier
repairTimeMultiplier.tooltip: Larger numbers increase the time it takes to repair parts of the ship.

gravityMultiplier.title: Ship Gravity Multiplier
gravityMultiplier.tooltip: Larger numbers increase the power of the ship's gravity crystal.

gravityDirection.title: Ship Gravity Direction
gravityDirection.tooltip: Changes the direction of your ship's gravity. If you set this to Random, you may find yourself standing diagonally in the ship.

atmosphereAngularDragMultiplier.title: Atmosphere Angular Drag Multiplier
atmosphereAngularDragMultiplier.tooltip: Larger numbers make your ship harder to turn while in an atmosphere. Set to zero to make your ship spin forever. WARNING: Values below 1 may cause motion sickness.

spaceAngularDragMultiplier.title: Space Angular Drag Multiplier
spaceAngularDragMultiplier.tooltip: Larger numbers make your ship harder to turn while in space. Set to zero to make your ship spin forever. WARNING: Values below 1 may cause motion sickness.

disableRotationSpeedLimit.title: Disable Rotation Speed Limit
disableRotationSpeedLimit.tooltip: Lets you spin your ship as quickly as you want. DO NOT ENABLE IF YOU ARE PRONE TO MOTION SICKNESS.

airDragMultiplier.title: Air Drag Multiplier
airDragMultiplier.tooltip: Larger numbers increase how much the ship is slowed down by air. Set to zero to disable air drag.

cycloneChaos.title: Cyclone Chaos
cycloneChaos.tooltip: Controls how violently cyclones should affect your ship.

waterDamage.title: Ship Water Damage
waterDamage.tooltip: Controls how much your ship is damaged by water. Maximum damage blows up your ship if you touch water.

sandDamage.title: Ship Sand Damage
sandDamage.tooltip: Controls how much your ship is damaged by falling sand. Maximum damage blows up your ship if you touch falling sand.

prolongDigestion.title: Prolong Digestion
prolongDigestion.tooltip: Makes the digestion of your ship a longer process. You will still die.

shipExplosionMultiplier.title: Ship Explosion Multiplier
shipExplosionMultiplier.tooltip: Larger numbers increase the size of the explosion that is created when your ship blows up.

moreExplosionDamage.title: Extra Explosion Damage
moreExplosionDamage.tooltip: Makes explosions apply damage to the ship and to fragments of Brittle Hollow. Also lets you kill anglerfish.

noiseMultiplier.title: Ship Noise Multiplier
noiseMultiplier.tooltip: Larger numbers increase the distance your ship can be heard by noise detectors.

extraNoise.title: Extra Noise
extraNoise.tooltip: Makes noisy parts of the ship like the master alarm detectable by noise detectors.

reactorLifetimeMultiplier.title: Reactor Lifetime Multiplier
reactorLifetimeMultiplier.tooltip: Larger numbers increase the time it takes for the reactor to blow up the ship. The default time is between 25 and 35 seconds.

shipFriction.title: Ship Friction
shipFriction.tooltip: Adjusts how much friction the ship has. The minimum makes your ship super slippery.

shipBounciness.title: Ship Bounciness
shipBounciness.tooltip: Adjusts how bouncy the ship is. Values above 1 will be less accurate and will no longer affect players.

shipInputLatency.title: Ship Input Latency
shipInputLatency.tooltip: Adds a delay in seconds while piloting the ship between when you press the button and when the ship recieves the input. Now you can pretend you're playing online!

funnySounds.title: Funny Sounds
funnySounds.tooltip: Replaces some of the in-game sounds with silly sound effects.

shipOxygenRefill.title: Enable Ship Oxygen Refill
shipOxygenRefill.tooltip: Refills the ship's oxygen tank when near oxygen sources. Doesn't work when oxygen is disabled.

oxygenRefillMultiplier.title: Oxygen Refill Multiplier
oxygenRefillMultiplier.tooltip: Larger numbers increase the speed at which the ship oxygen refills. The default speed takes about a minute to completely refill.

enableShipFuelTransfer.title: Enable Ship Fuel Transfer
enableShipFuelTransfer.tooltip: Lets you transfer your jetpack fuel to the ship through the fuel tank to refill it.

enableJetpackRefuelDrain.title: Enable Jetpack Refuel Drain
enableJetpackRefuelDrain.tooltip: Drains the ship's fuel when you refill your jetpack in the ship.

fuelTransferMultiplier.title: Fuel Transfer Multiplier
fuelTransferMultiplier.tooltip: Larger numbers increase the amount of fuel added to the ship when transferring fuel, and also increase the amount of fuel subtracted when refueling the jetpack.

enableAutoHatch.title: Enable Automatic Hatch
enableAutoHatch.tooltip: Automatically closes the hatch when you leave the ship.

extraEjectButtons.title: Extra Eject Buttons
extraEjectButtons.tooltip: Adds a few extra eject buttons to the ship.

addShipCurtain.title: Interactable Ship Curtain
addShipCurtain.tooltip: Lets you close the curtain in the ship cabin for some extra privacy in the cockpit.

shipWarpCoreType.title: Ship Warp Core
shipWarpCoreType.tooltip: Attaches a Nomai warp core to the cockpit that can be activated with a button on the ceiling of the cockpit. The Component option makes it a damageable component.

enableRepairConfirmation.title: Enable Repair Confirmation
enableRepairConfirmation.tooltip: Plays a sound when every damaged part of the ship has been repaired.

hotThrusters.title: Hazardous Thrusters
hotThrusters.tooltip: Makes the ship thruster flames do damage when you stand in them.

rustLevel.title: Cockpit Rust Level
rustLevel.tooltip: Controls how much rust is applied to the ship cockpit. Setting this to max will completely cover the cockpit in rust.

dirtAccumulationTime.title: Dirt Accumulation Time
dirtAccumulationTime.tooltip: Specifies the time in seconds that it takes for dirt to build up on your cockpit (0 is disabled). Find some water if you want to wash it off.

maxDirtAccumulation.title: Max Dirt Accumulation
maxDirtAccumulation.tooltip: Controls the max amount of dirt that can accumulate on your cockpit glass.

enableScoutLauncherComponent.title: Add Scout Launcher Component
enableScoutLauncherComponent.tooltip: Turns the ship's scout launcher into a fully functioning component. You won't be able to launch or recall your scout from the ship if it's damaged.

scoutPhotoMode.title: Ship Scout Photo Mode
scoutPhotoMode.tooltip: Lets you switch to photo mode with the ship's scout launcher.

enableSignalscopeComponent.title: Add Signalscope Component
enableSignalscopeComponent.tooltip: Turns the ship's signalscope into a fully functioning component. You won't be able to track signals in the ship or hear the ship's signal if the signalscope is damaged.

addShipSignal.title: Add Ship Signal
addShipSignal.tooltip: Allows you to track your ship with the signalscope on the Outer Wilds Ventures frequency. Slate also mentioned something about sending commands with your signalscope.

shipHornType.title: Ship Horn Variant
shipHornType.tooltip: Chooses which sound the ship's horn should make. You can honk by pressing the flashlight button when the signalscope is equipped and isn't damaged.

addShipClock.title: Add Ship Clock
addShipClock.tooltip: Adds a clock to the ship cockpit. It uses the standard Hearthian units of time: seconds and minutes.

enableShipItemPlacement.title: Ship Item Placement
enableShipItemPlacement.tooltip: Lets you drop items inside of the ship or on top of the ship.

addRepairWrench.title: Add Repair Wrench
addRepairWrench.tooltip: Adds a repair wrench to the cockpit and prevents you from making repairs unless you're holding it.

addPortableCampfire.title: Add Portable Campfire
addPortableCampfire.tooltip: Adds a portable campfire to the ship near your suit. Unpack it anywhere you'd like and roast a marshmallow!

addFuelCanister.title: Add Portable Fuel Canister
addFuelCanister.tooltip: Adds a portable fuel canister to the ship by the ship log. It has enough fuel to refill your jetpack about 3 times, and will also blow up if you hit it too hard.

addPortableTractorBeam.title: Add Portable Tractor Beam
addPortableTractorBeam.tooltip: Adds a portable Nomai tractor beam to the ship next to the reactor. Place it on the ground if you need an extra boost in height.

addExpeditionFlag.title: Add Expedition Flag
addExpeditionFlag.tooltip: Adds a portable flag to the ship between the cockpit and the supplies module. You can change the icon on the flag by following the instructions on the mod website.

addRadio.title: Add Radio
addRadio.tooltip: Adds a radio to the ship cockpit. You can change the 4-digit frequency to listen to music on it.

addTether.title: Add Ship Tether
addTether.tooltip: Adds a few hooks inside the ship that you can place anywhere you want. Interact with it to tether yourself to it, and interact with another to create a line between them.

unlimitedItems.title: Unlimited Items
unlimitedItems.tooltip: Lets you duplicate items inside the ship.

enableRemovableGravityCrystal.title: Removable Gravity Crystal
enableRemovableGravityCrystal.tooltip: Lets you remove the gravity crystal from the ship. It can be placed outside the ship on any surface for a portable gravity source.

enableGravityLandingGear.title: Add Gravity Landing Gear
enableGravityLandingGear.tooltip: Adds an interface to the cockpit for controlling the new gravity tech on your landing gear, which only functions when the landing gear isn't damaged.

enableThrustModulator.title: Add Thrust Modulator
enableThrustModulator.tooltip: Adds an interface to the cockpit for decreasing your ship's maximum thrust or putting your reactor in overdrive.

enableAutoAlign.title: Add Auto Align Controls
enableAutoAlign.tooltip: Adds an interface to the cockpit that lets you rotate your ship to face the current targeted object.

enableEnhancedAutopilot.title: Add Autopilot Controls
enableEnhancedAutopilot.tooltip: Adds an interface to the cockpit that gives you access to some of the new autopilot features Slate was working on.

addEngineSwitch.title: Add Engine Switch
addEngineSwitch.tooltip: Adds a switch to the cockpit that turns on the ship. If you turned on Idle Fuel Consumption, it will only drain fuel while the ship is on.

enableShipTemperature.title: Enable Ship Temperature
enableShipTemperature.tooltip: Adds a temperature mechanic to the ship. Check the README for more details about how it works.

temperatureZonesAmount.title: Add Temperature Zones
temperatureZonesAmount.tooltip: Determines what type of temperature zones to add. Temperature zones will increase or decrease your ship's temperature.

hullTemperatureDamage.title: Hull Temperature Damage
hullTemperatureDamage.tooltip: Damages the ship hull over time in extremely high or low temperatures.

componentTemperatureDamage.title: Component Temperature Damage
componentTemperatureDamage.tooltip: Damages the ship components over time in extremely high or low temperatures.

temperatureDamageMultiplier.title: Temperature Damage Multiplier
temperatureDamageMultiplier.tooltip: Larger numbers increase the damage that the ship takes from extreme temperatures.

temperatureResistanceMultiplier.title: Temperature Resistance Multiplier
temperatureResistanceMultiplier.tooltip: Larger numbers increase the time the ship can resist extreme temperatures. The default resistance gives the ship around 3 minutes before the hull reaches max temperature.

faultyHeatRegulators.title: Faulty Heat Regulators
faultyHeatRegulators.tooltip: Your reactor constantly heats up your ship, making anywhere that isn't cold a potential danger. You can cool off your ship by finding somewhere cold.

enableColorBlending.title: Enable Color Blending
enableColorBlending.tooltip: Lets you blend the decorations between different colors based on chosen parameters.

shipLightColorBlend.title: Ship Light Blend
shipLightColorBlend.tooltip: Sets the method of blending between colors.

shipLightColorOptions.title: Ship Light Color Options
shipLightColorOptions.tooltip: Sets the number of colors to blend between.

shipLightColor1.title: Ship Light Color
shipLightColor1.tooltip: Changes the color of the interior and exterior ship lights.

shipLightColor2.title: Ship Light Color
shipLightColor2.tooltip: Changes the color of the interior and exterior ship lights.

shipLightColor3.title: Ship Light Color
shipLightColor3.tooltip: Changes the color of the interior and exterior ship lights.

interiorHullColorBlend.title: Interior Hull Blend
interiorHullColorBlend.tooltip: Sets the method of blending between colors.

interiorHullColorOptions.title: Interior Hull Color Options
interiorHullColorOptions.tooltip: Sets the number of colors to blend between.

interiorHullColor1.title: Interior Hull Color
interiorHullColor1.tooltip: Changes the color of the inside of the ship.

interiorHullColor2.title: Interior Hull Color
interiorHullColor2.tooltip: Changes the color of the inside of the ship.

interiorHullColor3.title: Interior Hull Color
interiorHullColor3.tooltip: Changes the color of the inside of the ship.

exteriorHullColorBlend.title: Exterior Hull Blend
exteriorHullColorBlend.tooltip: Sets the method of blending between colors.

exteriorHullColorOptions.title: Exterior Hull Color Options
exteriorHullColorOptions.tooltip: Sets the number of colors to blend between.

exteriorHullColor1.title: Exterior Hull Color
exteriorHullColor1.tooltip: Changes the color of the outside of the ship.

exteriorHullColor2.title: Exterior Hull Color
exteriorHullColor2.tooltip: Changes the color of the outside of the ship.

exteriorHullColor3.title: Exterior Hull Color
exteriorHullColor3.tooltip: Changes the color of the outside of the ship.

thrusterColorBlend.title: Thruster Blend
thrusterColorBlend.tooltip: Sets the method of blending between colors.

thrusterColorOptions.title: Thruster Color Options
thrusterColorOptions.tooltip: Sets the number of colors to blend between.

thrusterColor1.title: Ship Thruster Flame Color
thrusterColor1.tooltip: Changes the color of the thruster flames produced by the ship.

thrusterColor2.title: Ship Thruster Flame Color
thrusterColor2.tooltip: Changes the color of the thruster flames produced by the ship.

thrusterColor3.title: Ship Thruster Flame Color
thrusterColor3.tooltip: Changes the color of the thruster flames produced by the ship.

indicatorColorBlend.title: Damage Indicator Blend
indicatorColorBlend.tooltip: Sets the method of blending between colors.

indicatorColorOptions.title: Damage Indicator Color Options
indicatorColorOptions.tooltip: Sets the number of colors to blend between.

indicatorColor1.title: Damage Indicator Color
indicatorColor1.tooltip: Changes the color of the damage indicators on the ship.

indicatorColor2.title: Damage Indicator Color
indicatorColor2.tooltip: Changes the color of the damage indicators on the ship.

indicatorColor3.title: Damage Indicator Color
indicatorColor3.tooltip: Changes the color of the damage indicators on the ship.

keepHelmetOn.title: Keep Helmet On
keepHelmetOn.tooltip: Prevents the game from automatically removing your helmet if there isn't oxygen present.

showWarningNotifications.title: Show Warning Notifications
showWarningNotifications.tooltip: Notifies you in the ship when resources are low or when the outside conditions are becoming dangerous.

shipGravityFix.title: Fix Ship Gravity
shipGravityFix.tooltip: Lets you walk around your ship normally when in high-gravity areas, like near the sun.

splitLockOn.title: Split Ship Lock-on
splitLockOn.tooltip: Separates the player lock-on target and the ship lock-on target.

alwaysAllowLockOn.title: Always Allow Map Lock-on
alwaysAllowLockOn.tooltip: Let's you lock onto targets in the map view at any time.

fixShipThrustIndicator.title: Fix Ship Thrust Indicator
fixShipThrustIndicator.tooltip: Fixes a bug where the ship's thrust indicator turns off when you leave the console.
